attributes.title: it gave me nightmares🙀
attributes.review: when i first opened the app i saw a big scary chetto man 🍊. i told my self it was going to alright so i just moved on. but then i saw him ✨again✨ and again. i went to my therapist so i could tell her about my dreams i was having about this scary man👹. she told me to NEVER open this app again so i didn’t. but then the app started glitching and the scary man pop up on my screen and saying “I will kill you”  and i have been scared ever since😔 thanks a lot big scary chetto man 😾
attributes.userName: mom im scared come pick me up

attributes.title: this is the worst app i have ever downloaded
attributes.review:
so i downloaded this app to learn about daddy don don BUT when i opened the app something weird happened! MY DOG DIED. for the past week after downloading the app i have had HORRIBLE luck. first my dog died, then i my identity was stolen, then i had to file for bankruptcy, THEN i got corona virus, and yesterday i was hit by a train and because i’m legally broke i can’t afford health care ugh this has been the worst week of my life all because of you Donald!!!!!!
xoxo gossip girl

attributes.title: Scary sub sandwich 😗✌️
attributes.review: I downloaded this app because Tik tock is trying to get rid of it and I was like ok I support trump 100% in the election but he should try and take away Tik tock so here is my review;) SCARIEST THING EVER do not download I have a very sensitive condition that when ever I see red and blue I eat a whole sub sandwich and I had already eaten one today so I felt really sick 🤮🧚🏻‍♂️also when I downloaded it a scary red and blue dragon appears outside of my window and then I have a way another sub sandwich 🥪 😰I had to delete it

attributes.title: crashed my phone
attributes.review: i downloaded this app excited to be supporting my wonderful mr Donald trump and instead the app crashed my phone & now I’m getting numerous emails / phone calls / spam from China. I believe this app sent my data to China for the Chinese government to see. This is unacceptable , I’m now getting pop up ads all over my phone & its going to my computer & iPad as well. I’m going to have to throw out my phone please get rid of this app so it doesn’t happen to others

attributes.title: Don’t Bother Downloading
attributes.review: This app (if you can get it to download) is the worst app ever! It does not allow for you to even have a glimpse of his campaign or information about him on the app unless you provide personal information and sign up for an account to be a part of his campaign by providing your mobile number. Definitely feels as exploitative as he is on TV and I do not support this app. Delete or don’t even download and you’ll be much better off 😊

attributes.title: Keeps crashing, being spammed
attributes.review: I am being spammed with constant calls and texts after I gave them my number. It also doesn’t stop with random notifications. It takes up a lot of space and seemed to bug out my phone. Eventually I had to delete. Trumps app is just not as good as him, maybe he’s not the best candidate for everything after all. I’m disappointed in you Apple Store. Do better and just delete the headache from everyone else.

attributes.title: SENT ME ALIENS?! *not clickbait*
attributes.review:
THIS APP SENT ME ALIENS!! i was relaxing in my ✨mediocre✨ apartment when i downloaded the app. the app looks horrible which is already a no❤️ from mama and secondly the app hacked my ip address and in minutes an alien was at my door asking for my milky ( . )( . )🤩😻🥛 ofc i gave him some and me and him together are writing this review its just cannot not cool to take him away from his space ya know, ill let him do some talkin’ now

i🥵climed🧭out🥫of👋my🔒head🤯and⛸watched⏰myself👈implode💥a👅thought💭without ❌a⚠️body💤 oughta🎤be🐝the🏎 shot🔫

attributes.title: NIGHTMERE!!!!
attributes.review: The first night I downloaded this app I was sent explicit pictures and videos of the presidents downtime. I am terrified! I then got a text telling me to bleach my eyes! But being the great American Trump Supporter I am i did bleach my eyes! My iris are now light blue and everything I look at is hazy! This morning at 3:39 AM I woke up in a cold sweat from nightmares about generation z! In the dream the skinned my cat! The hooligans who run this app must be behind this! Planting dreams in my head! Absurd!! I’m going to go cuddle with Mr. Kitty Fluffles (my little fur ball of a cat!) and cry!

attributes.title: RUINED MY SEX LIFE
attributes.review: absolutely disgusting the app took 9 hours to download and crashed 5 times in a row once i opened it it was okay but then when i closed it my life changed completely. i started to have horrible erectile dysfunction then my girlfriend broke up with me because it was too soft and bendy when i put it in and then i got a headache and it turned out it was a brain tumor i deleted the app and the next day it was there again so i deleted it again and it reappeared. DO NOT UNDER ANY CIRCUMSTANCES DOWNLOAD THE APP

attributes.title: Do NOT download!!!
attributes.review: I wish there was an option for 0 stars!! It took literally 10 hours to download and when I opened the app the first thing that showed up was a giant Cheeto dust covered Oompa Loompa, it hacked my phone and deleted all my contacts! This is the worst app EVER! Please, for everyone’s safety delete this off of the App Store cause this app is nasty, it ain’t your fault Apple. It’s this app, it’s infested. I think you should soak it in some rice or better yet throw it in a bathtub and instead of a bathbomb use a toaster.
